name: Fixed Assets
description: Tangible assets held by the company for use in the production or supply of goods or services
description@zh_HK: 本公司持有的用於生產或供應商品或服務的有形資產

name: Technology
description: Technological products or services bought for your business
description@zh_HK: 為您的企業購買的技術產品或服務

name: Land
description: Purchases of lands without buildings
description@zh_HK: 購買無建築物的土地

name: Construction
description: Construction of buildings and costs associated to buildings
description@zh_HK: 建築物的建造及相關成本

name: Installations
description: Purchases of installations related to buildings, like solar panels or heater
description@zh_HK: 購買與建築物相關的裝置，例如太陽能電池板或加熱器

name: Machines
description: Machinery and tools directly related to your business
description@zh_HK: 與您的業務直接相關的機械和工具

name: Other property
description: Other type of property, like plants, machinery or various equipment
description@zh_HK: 其他類型的財產，例如廠房、機械或各種設備

name: Furniture & material
description: Large expenses related to workplaces
description@zh_HK: 與工作場所相關的大筆支出

name: Vehicle
description: Purchase of a car, including second hand or after-lease contract
description@zh_HK: 購買汽車，包括二手車或租賃期滿後的汽車合約

name: Vehicle accessories
description: All accessories purchases related to your professional vehicle
description@zh_HK: 所有與您的專業車輛相關的配件採購

name: Furniture and Fixtures
description: Long-term assets for office and workplace furnishings.
description@zh_HK: 辦公及工作場所家具的長期資產。

name: Funds in Transit
description: Money transferred between accounts or locations, not yet received by the destination.
description@zh_HK: 帳戶或地點之間轉帳的資金，尚未到達目的地。

name: Equipment
description: Long-term assets such as specialized tools or operational hardware.
description@zh_HK: 長期資產，例如專用工具或操作硬體。

name: Decoration
description: Costs capitalized for interior or exterior decorative improvements.
description@zh_HK: 用於室內或室外裝飾改造的成本已資本化。

name: Investments
description: Assets held for long-term capital appreciation or income generation.
description@zh_HK: 為實現長期資本增值或收益而持有的資產。

name: Current Assets
description: Assets expected to be sold, consumed, or converted to cash within one year.
description@zh_HK: 預計一年內出售、消耗或變現的資產。

name: Bank
description: Funds held in the company's primary operational bank accounts.
description@zh_HK: 公司主要營運銀行帳戶中的資金。

name: Stripe Issuing
description: Funds held within specialized payment processing platforms.
description@zh_HK: 資金存放在專門的支付處理平台。

name: Bank Suspense Account
description: Temporary account for transactions where the final destination is pending.
description@zh_HK: 用於最終目的地尚未確定的交易的臨時帳戶。

name: Outstanding Receipts
description: Cash or cheques received but not yet deposited in the bank.
description@zh_HK: 已收到但尚未存入銀行的現金或支票。

name: Outstanding Payments
description: Cheques or payments issued but not yet cleared by the bank.
description@zh_HK: 已開立但尚未經銀行清算的支票或付款。

name: Account Receivable
description: Amounts due from customers for goods or services already sold.
description@zh_HK: 客戶應收的已售商品或服務款項。

name: Utility & Rental Deposit
description: Recoverable deposits placed with landlords or utility providers.
description@zh_HK: 向房東或公用事業公司繳納的可收回押金。

name: Supplier Prepayments
description: Payments made to suppliers in advance of receiving the goods or services.
description@zh_HK: 在收到貨物或服務之前向供應商支付的款項。

name: Account Receivable (PoS)
description: Amounts due from customers specifically via Point of Sale transactions.
description@zh_HK: 顧客透過銷售點交易應支付的款項。

name: Sundry Deposits
description: Miscellaneous recoverable deposits made to third parties.
description@zh_HK: 向第三方支付的其他可收回押金。

name: Other Receivable
description: Amounts due from parties other than primary trade customers.
description@zh_HK: 除主要貿易客戶以外的其他各方應付的款項。

name: Stock Interim Account (Received)
description: Temporary account for inventory received but not yet recorded in final stock.
description@zh_HK: 用於存放已收到但尚未計入最終庫存的庫存的臨時帳戶。

name: Stock Interim Account (Delivered)
description: Temporary account for inventory delivered but not yet invoiced.
description@zh_HK: 已交付但尚未開立的庫存臨時帳戶。

name: Stock Valuation Account
description: Represents the total value of inventory currently held in stock.
description@zh_HK: 代表當前庫存商品的總價值。

name: Prepaid Expenses
description: Payments made for expenses that will be consumed in a future accounting period.
description@zh_HK: 為將在未來會計期間消耗的費用支付的款項。

name: Accumulated Depreciation - Fixed Assets (Control)
name@zh_HK: 折舊 - 固定資產（控制）

name: Non-current Liabilities
description: Debts payable in more than one year.
description@zh_HK: 一年以上到期的債務。

name: Unearned Income from System
description: Payments received in advance for services not yet provided.
description@zh_HK: 預先收取但尚未提供服務的款項。

name: Current Liabilities
description: Debts payable within one year.
description@zh_HK: 一年內償還的債務。

name: Accruals
description: Expenses incurred but not yet billed or paid.
description@zh_HK: 已發生但尚未開立帳單或支付的費用。

name: MPF Accrued (Employer)
description: Mandatory MPF (pension fund) contributions due by the employer.
description@zh_HK: 雇主應繳納的強制性強積金（退休基金）供款。

name: MPF Witheld (Employee)
description: MPF contributions withheld from employee salaries and due to the scheme.
description@zh_HK: 從僱員薪金中扣除的強積金供款，是由於該計劃而產生的。

name: Account Payable
description: Amounts owed to suppliers for goods or services received.
description@zh_HK: 已收到商品或服務，應向供應商支付的款項。

name: Receipt in Advance (Customer Prepayments)
description: Funds received from customers for orders not yet delivered.
description@zh_HK: 已收到客戶支付的尚未交付訂單的款項。

name: Provision for Taxation
description: Estimated income tax (Profits Tax) liability due to the government.
description@zh_HK: 預計應向政府繳納的所得稅（利潤稅）。

name: Proposed Dividend
description: Dividends that the board has proposed to pay shareholders.
description@zh_HK: 董事會提議向股東支付的股利。

name: Other Payable
description: Miscellaneous amounts owed to third parties not classified as Accounts Payable.
description@zh_HK: 未歸類為應付帳款的欠第三方雜項款項。

name: Payroll Payable
description: Amounts owed to employees and authorities.
description@zh_HK: 應付員工及相關機構的薪資款項。

name: Paid Capital
description: Value of share capital paid into the company by shareholders.
description@zh_HK: 股東向公司所繳納的股本價值。

name: Accumulated Profit & Loss
description: Total net profits or losses carried forward from prior years.
description@zh_HK: 前年度結轉的淨利或虧損總額。

name: Profit & Loss Account
description: Net result (profit or loss) for the current financial year.
description@zh_HK: 本財政年度的淨結果（利潤或虧損）。

name: Short-term Borrowing
description: Bank loans or other debts due to be repaid in less than one year.
description@zh_HK: 銀行貸款或其他債務，到期日不到一年。

name: Trade Income
description: Revenue generated from the company's core business activities (sales of goods or services).
description@zh_HK: 公司核心業務活動（商品或服務的銷售）所產生的收入。

name: Other Income and Gains
description: Auxiliary income from non-core sources.
description@zh_HK: 來自非核心來源的輔助收入。

name: Sundry Income
description: Small, miscellaneous, and occasional revenue items.
description@zh_HK: 小額、雜項和偶發性收入項目。

name: Exchange Adjustment
description: Unrealized foreign currency rate adjustments.
description@zh_HK: 未實現的外匯匯率調整。

name: Bank Interest Income
description: Interest earned on the company's bank deposits.
description@zh_HK: 公司銀行存款所獲得的利息。

name: Foreign Exchange Gain
description: Realized profit from foreign currency transactions.
description@zh_HK: 外匯交易實現利潤。

name: Cash Discount Gain
description: Gain earned by receiving early payment from customers.
description@zh_HK: 提前收取客戶款項而獲得的收益。

name: Costs
description: General header for expenses directly linked to generating primary revenue.
description@zh_HK: 與產生主要收入直接相關的費用總標題。

name: Trade Costs
description: Direct costs associated with buying or producing trade goods or services.
description@zh_HK: 與購買或生產貿易商品或服務相關的直接成本。

name: Misc. Costs
description: Miscellaneous small costs related to trade or direct operations.
description@zh_HK: 與貿易或直接營運相關的其他小額費用。

name: Costs of Transportation
description: Expenses for transporting goods, typically inbound or directly for sales.
description@zh_HK: 貨物運輸費用，通常指進貨或直接銷售的貨物運輸費用。

name: Declaration Fees
description: Fees associated with customs or regulatory declarations.
description@zh_HK: 與海關或監管申報相關的費用。

name: Packing Fees
description: Costs incurred for packaging goods for sale or delivery.
description@zh_HK: 為銷售或交付商品而產生的包裝費用。

name: Expenses
description: General header for administrative and operational expenditures.
description@zh_HK: 行政和營運支出總表。

name: Bank Charges
description: Fees and commissions charged by banks and financial institutions.
description@zh_HK: 銀行和金融機構收取的費用和佣金。

name: Entertainment
description: Costs for entertaining clients, customers, or business partners.
description@zh_HK: 招待客戶、顧客或商業夥伴的費用。

name: Electricity, Gas and Water Fees
description: Utility expenses for electricity and water consumption.
description@zh_HK: 電力和水費等公用事業費用。

name: Phone & internet
description: Internet or phone bills incurred
description@zh_HK: 產生的網路或電話費用

name: Postage & Stamps
description: Costs for mail, delivery services, and stamps.
description@zh_HK: 郵件、快遞服務和郵票的費用。

name: Printing & Stationery
description: Costs for office supplies, paper, and printing services.
description@zh_HK: 辦公用品、紙張和列印服務的費用。

name: Rent & Rates
description: Expenses for rent (office/storage) and local property taxes (Rates).
description@zh_HK: 租金（辦公室/倉庫）和地方房產稅（稅率）費用。

name: Office Rent
description: Rental fees related to your workplace
description@zh_HK: 與您的工作場所相關的租金

name: Vehicle rent
description: Rental of cars, including shared services, but excluding leasing
description@zh_HK: 汽車租賃，包括共享服務，但不包括租賃

name: Sundry Expenses
description: Various small, miscellaneous expenses not fitting other categories.
description@zh_HK: 各種不屬於其他類別的小額雜項支出。

name: Telecommunication Expenses
description: Bills for phone, mobile, and internet services.
description@zh_HK: 電話、手機和網路服務帳單。

name: Traffic Fees
description: Fees and tolls related to vehicle usage (e.g., tunnel tolls).
description@zh_HK: 與車輛使用相關的費用和通行費（例如，隧道通行費）。

name: IT Expenses
description: Costs for software, IT support, and technology services.
description@zh_HK: 軟體、IT支援和技術服務的費用。

name: Insurance
description: Premiums paid for various types of business insurance coverage.
description@zh_HK: 為各種類型的商業保險支付的保費。

name: Fire insurance
description: Fees related to insurance to protect your property (building and content) against fire or other natural catastrophes
description@zh_HK: 與保險相關的費用，用於保護您的財產（建築物和室內物品）免受火災或其他自然災害的侵害。

name: Professional insurance
description: All fees related to insurance taken in the context of your business
description@zh_HK: 所有與保險相關的費用均在您的業務範圍內收取。

name: Legal protection insurance
description: Insurance against legal costs incurred in the context of your activity
description@zh_HK: 為您的活動相關的法律費用提供保險

name: Professional Liability Insurance
description: Insurance for damage caused to third parties
description@zh_HK: 對第三方造成的損害的保險

name: Sales Commission
description: Payments made to sales staff or agents based on performance.
description@zh_HK: 根據業績向銷售人員或代理商支付的款項。

name: Overseas Traveling
description: Expenses incurred for business travel outside of Hong Kong.
description@zh_HK: 在香港以外地區出差所產生的費用。

name: MPF Contribution (Employer)
description: Employer's share of Mandatory Provident Fund contributions.
description@zh_HK: 雇主應繳納的強制性公積金部分。

name: Wages & Salaries
description: Gross payroll payments to employees.
description@zh_HK: 支付給員工的總薪資。

name: Bonus Payment
description: Payments made to employees outside of regular wages/salaries.
description@zh_HK: 支付給員工的除正常工資/薪水以外的款項。

name: Taxation
description: Expenses for various taxes and duties (excluding Profits Tax provision).
description@zh_HK: 各項稅金支出（不含利潤稅準備金）。

name: Property tax
description: Local taxes that have to paid due to the ownership of property
description@zh_HK: 因擁有房產而必須繳納的地方稅。

name: Local Delivery
description: Costs for delivering goods within Hong Kong.
description@zh_HK: 香港市內貨物運輸費用。

name: Management & Administration Fees
description: Fees paid for general management or administrative services.
description@zh_HK: 一般管理或行政服務費用。

name: Depreciation
description: General depreciation expense for company assets.
description@zh_HK: 公司資產一般折舊費用。

name: Depreciation of intangible assets
description: Expense for the loss in value of intangible items (e.g., software or licenses).
description@zh_HK: 無形資產（例如軟體或許可證）價值損失的費用。

name: Depreciation of property, plant and equipment
description: Expense for the loss in value of physical assets (ex: buildings or machines).
description@zh_HK: 實體資產（例如：建築物或機器）價值損失的費用。

name: Audit Fees
description: Fees paid to external auditors for statutory financial reviews.
description@zh_HK: 支付給外部審計師進行法定財務審查的費用。

name: Bad Debts
description: Losses resulting from customer accounts deemed uncollectible.
description@zh_HK: 因客戶帳戶無法收回而造成的損失。

name: Legal & Professional Fees
description: Fees paid to lawyers, consultants, or other professionals.
description@zh_HK: 支付給律師、顧問或其他專業人士的費用。

name: Dividend
description: Expense related to the distribution of profits to shareholders.
description@zh_HK: 與向股東分配利潤相關的費用。

name: Disposal
description: Loss incurred from the sale or retirement of an asset.
description@zh_HK: 因出售或報廢資產而產生的損失。

name: Repair and Maintenance
description: Costs to keep and repair fixed assets in working condition.
description@zh_HK: 維持和維修固定資產使其維持正常運作的成本。

name: Office Maintenance services
description: Services related to the maintenance of your workplace, like repair or cleaning fees
description@zh_HK: 與您的工作場所維護相關的服務，例如維修或清潔費用

name: Vehicle maintenance
description: Expenses made for the repair and maintenance of a vehicle
description@zh_HK: 車輛維修保養費用

name: Advertising
description: Expenses for marketing, publicity, and advertising campaigns.
description@zh_HK: 行銷、宣傳和廣告活動的費用。

name: Foreign Exchange Loss
description: Realized loss from foreign currency transactions.
description@zh_HK: 外匯交易造成的已實現損失。

name: Raw materials
description: All goods purchased as raw materials used by your activity
description@zh_HK: 您活動中使用的所有作為原料購買的商品

name: Consumables
description: Consumables bought and used in the context of your activity
description@zh_HK: 在活動中購買和使用的消耗品

name: Studies & works
description: Compensation and fees paid to other parties
description@zh_HK: 向其他各方支付的補償和費用

name: Flights
description: All expenses related to travel by plane
description@zh_HK: 所有與乘飛機旅行相關的費用

name: Hotels
description: Hotel or B&B bills incurred during business trips
description@zh_HK: 出差期間產生的飯店或民宿帳單

name: Public Transportation
description: Travel expenses done using public transportation (metro, bus, tramways, ...)
description@zh_HK: 使用大眾運輸工具（地鐵、公車、電車等）的旅遊費用

name: Other travel costs
description: Expenses incurred during business trips (Excluding Flights, Hotels, Daily expenses, public transportation)
description@zh_HK: 商務旅行期間產生的費用（不包括機票、飯店、日常開支、大眾運輸）

name: General subcontracting
description: Compensation and fees with other partners that act as subcontractors or consultants for your activity
description@zh_HK: 與其他合作夥伴（作為分包商或顧問參與您的活動）的補償和費用

name: Goods for resale
description: Goods you buy to resale later, as part of your activity
description@zh_HK: 您購買日後轉售的商品，這是您活動的一部分。

name: Office supplies
description: Various supplies bought for your workplace or office, like pencils, paper etc
description@zh_HK: 為工作場所或辦公室購買的各種用品，例如鉛筆、紙張等。

name: Office services
description: All expenses made for your office or workplace that are not material goods
description@zh_HK: 所有與辦公室或工作場所相關的非物質性支出

name: Fuel
description: All fuel expenses for a car
description@zh_HK: 汽車的所有燃油費用

name: Accounting
description: Bills from your accountant or accounting firm
description@zh_HK: 來自您的會計師或會計事務所的帳單

name: Membership fees
description: Subscriptions to clubs and associations related to your business
description@zh_HK: 與您的業務相關的俱樂部和協會的訂閱

name: Business gift
description: Business gifts to clients over 50€
description@zh_HK: 贈送給客戶價值超過 50 歐元的商務禮品

name: Employees compensation
description: Compensation costs for employees and manual workers employed by the company
description@zh_HK: 公司僱用的員工和體力勞動者的補償成本

name: Other personnel costs
description: Company's personnel costs excluding compensation, contributions and vouchers
description@zh_HK: 公司人員成本（不包括薪資、繳款和憑證）

name: Bar & Restaurant
description: Expenses incurred when eating or drinking at bars or restaurants
description@zh_HK: 在酒吧或餐廳用餐或飲酒時產生的費用

name: Food: Reception & delivery
description: Food or drinks incurred outside of bars or restaurants, like receptions, canteen and food delivery, etc
description@zh_HK: 在酒吧或餐廳以外的地方購買的食物或飲料，例如招待會、食堂和外賣等。

name: Training and documentation
description: Training fees not including food and drinks
description@zh_HK: 培訓費用不含餐飲。

name: Social Security
description: All fees related to pension plans and social security contributions
description@zh_HK: 所有與退休金計劃和社會保障繳款相關的費用

name: Import fees
description: Customs fees incurred while importing goods from outside of the European Union
description@zh_HK: 從歐盟以外地區進口貨物時所產生的關稅

name: Cash Discount Loss
description: Loss incurred by granting early payment discounts to customers.
description@zh_HK: 因給予客戶提前付款折扣而造成的損失。

name: Cash Difference Gain
description: Revenue resulting from an unexplained cash overage.
description@zh_HK: 因無法解釋的現金盈餘而產生的收入。

name: Cash Difference Loss
description: Expense resulting from an unexplained cash shortage.
description@zh_HK: 因不明原因的現金短缺而產生的費用。

name: Undistributed Profits/Losses
description: Final equity account where the current year's profit or loss is closed.
description@zh_HK: 最終權益帳戶，用於結算本年度的損益。
